text: Aey Nabi, inse kaho, “kabhi tumne aankhein khol kar dekha bhi ke woh hastiyan hain kya jinhein tum khuda ko chodh kar pukarte ho? Zara mujhey dikhao to sahih ke zameen mein unhon ne kya paida kiya hai, ya aasmano ki takhleeq o tadbeer mein unka kya hissa hai. Issey pehle aayi hui kitaab ya ilm ka koi baqiyya (in aqaid ke sabot mein) tumhare paas ho to wahi le aao agar tum sacche ho”
